title: Large patch and slow download speed
body:
It would seem every patch is 9GB  and above, whether its a large patch or not.
But problem for me is slow download speed.
I can not get past 110Kbps. This is second time it is happening, same happened during patch 8.5.

Does anyone has similar issues ?

replies.body: i have exact same issue. SLow downloading speed

Hey! 

To explain the larger patches, our [Support page](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport/status/970778709845204993) provided some context: 

*Wanted to reach out and let you know that patches 8.5-8.8 and maybe 8.10 are going to be significantly bigger than your usual patch, so don't panic! If you want to know why they are bigger head over here for more information: http://riot.com/2CVkRMl *
